Jekklet

Jekyll Booklet is an easy way to publish beautiful, single-paged, simple-indexed HTML Books through Jekyll , "a simple, blog aware, static site generator". This beautiful theme used to make markdown files appear like pages in a book, is a merge of two awesome layouts, FullScreenBookBlock and MultiLevelPushMenu. Only the merge and some modifications were done by me, the major part of theme is work of Mary Lou at codrops.

You can flip pages of this booklet, using arrow keys on keyboard, arrow buttons on top-left of page and touch gestures.

Jekyll Booklet

Jekyll Booklet is an easy way to publish beautiful, single-paged, simple-indexed HTML Books through Jekyll , "a simple, blog aware, static site generator". This beautiful theme used to make markdown files appear like pages in a book, is a merge of two awesome layouts, FullScreenBookBlock and MultiLevelPushMenu. Only the merge and some modifications were done by me, the major part of theme is work of Mary Lou at codrops.

You can flip pages of this booklet, using arrow keys on keyboard, arrow buttons on top-left of page and touch gestures.
